title: A Philosophy Collection (Kindle Books)
description:
Here is my collection of books about philosophy, critical thinking, ideas, and theories. Most of them are non-specialist and are written for the general reader. The books are listed below:

50 Big Ideas You Really Need to Know - Ben Dupre

50 Economics Ideas You Really Need to Know - Conway, Edmund

50 Ethics Ideas You Really Need to Know - Dupre, Ben

50 Human Brain Ideas You Really To Know - Moheb Costandi

50 Literature Ideas You Really Need to Know  - John Sutherland

50 Mathematical Ideas You Really Need to Know - Tony Crilly

50 Philosophy Ideas You Really Need to Know - Durpe, Ben

50 Political Ideas You Really Need to Know - Dupre, Ben

50 Psychology Ideas You Really Need to Know - Adrian Furnham

A Little History of Philosophy - Warburton, Nigel

A Skeptics' Skeptic - Pigliucci, Massimo

A Universe From Nothing - Krauss, Lawrence 

Advanced Critical Thinking Skills - Roy van den Brink-Budgen

Against Intellectual Monopoly - Michele Boldrin & David K. Levine

Against Intellectual Property - Kinsella, N. Stephan

Among the Dead Cities - A.C. Grayling

An Introduction to Criticism - Ryan, Michael

Anarchism (Beginner's Guides) - Kinna, Ruth

Anarchism: A Very Short Introduction - Ward, Colin

Answers for Aristotle: How Science and Philosophy Can Lead Us to a More Meaningful Life - Pigliucci, Massimo

Antisemitism: A Very Short Introduction - Steven Beller

Arguably: Selected Essays - Christopher Hitchens

Arguments for Atheists_ Secular Reasoning in the 21st Century - Jason Wilks

Atheism 101_ Answers, Explanations, and Rebutals - Grigory Lukin

Atheism_ A Very Short Introduction - Julian Baggini

Bad Pharma_ How drug companies mislead doctors and harm patients - Goldacre, Ben

Bad Science - Goldacre, Ben

Beginning theory - Barry, Peter

Being Logical_ A Guide to Good Thinking - Mcinerny, D.Q_

Bible_ New American Bible, Revised Edition 2011

Biblical Nonsense - Long, Jason

Big Ideas in Brief_ 200 World-Changing Concepts Explained in an Instant - Ian Crofton

Blame Hitchens, Dawkins & Harris_ Essays of a New Atheist - G.M. Jackson

Breaking the Spell_ Religion as a Natural Phenomenon - Dennett, Daniel 

Can a Robot be Human? - Peter Cave

Candide, or Optimism (Penguin Classics) - Francois Voltaire

Catholicism_ A Very Short Introduction - O'Collins, Gerald

Complete Works - Plato

Consciousness Explained - Dennett, Daniel

Cosmos - Carl Sagan
